title: Be Afraid (CRE121)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our twenty first episode, storytellers Margaret Cho, Janeane Garofalo, Michael Showalter, Maria Bamford and Kevin Allison tell true tales of times they were very afraid.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Margaret Cho, Janeane Garofalo, Matt Cheplic, Marshall York, Jed Hershon, King Baldwin, Bradbury, Nate Starkey, Mr. and Mrs. Brian, Anne van Schothorst, The Underscore Orkestra, People Like Us, Kevin Allison, Latche Swing, Ashley Ward, Ergo Phizmizz, Michael Showalter, Roosevelt Dime, Jordan Cooper, David Buchs, Dan Rosen, Maria Bamford)
